name: addcan2i
params: class c0, class c1, class c2
body: |- wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))

stmt.origin: mp3an(wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc))

-| wcel(c0, cc)

-| wcel(c1, cc)

body.origin: |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c2, cc), wcel(c1, cc)), wb(wceq(co(c0, caddc, c1), co(c2, caddc, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))

comment: Cancellation law for addition. Theorem I.1 of [Apostol] p. 18. (Contributed by NM, 14-May-2003.) (Revised by Scott Fenton, 3-Jan-2013.)
